properties.name: doky.kafka.emails.topic
properties.description: This is the Kafka topic used for email processing.

properties.name: doky.kafka.emails.group.id
properties.description: This is the group ID for the Kafka consumer group used for email processing.

properties.name: doky.kafka.emails.consumer.id
properties.description: This is the unique identifier for the Kafka consumer used for processing emails.

properties.name: doky.kafka.emails.consumer.autostart
properties.description: This property indicates whether the Kafka email consumer should start automatically.

properties.name: doky.kafka.emails.concurrency
properties.description: This property specifies the level of concurrency for the Kafka email consumer, determining the number of threads processing email messages.
